1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In this episode, Jonny talks to Dr. Ren about the dating world.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: In this episode, Jonny talks to Dr. Ren about polygamous and monogamous relationships.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: In this episode, Jonny talks to Dr. Ren about Gender identity, Transexuality, and what that all means. With Special Guest Tien Wee.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: In this episode, Jonny talks to Dr. Ren about coming out and where you can find your place within the LGBT community. With special guest Robin Perelle.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: In this episode, Jonny investigates the world of kink and vanilla with Dr. Ren.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: In this episode, Jonny and Dr. Ren discuss masturbation. With special guest Jim Deva.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: In this episode, Jonny and Dr. Ren discuss sex, disabilities, aging, and drugs. With special guest Jim Deva.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: In this episode, Jonny and Dr. Ren talk about labels. With special guest Meta Bach.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: In this episode, Jonny talks to Dr. Ren about relationship issues.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: In this episode, Jonny and Dr. Ren talk about masturbation and female ejaculation. With special guest Amber Dawn.

imdb.plot outline: Renowned sexpert and columnist, Dr. Pega Ren, has teamed up with OUTtv to bring you a sex and relationship advice show for the GLBT community. Along with co-host Jonny Staub, Dr. Ren brings you the latest info on Dating & Courtship, Masturbation, Gender Identity, and a variety of other topics. Not one to miss a step, Dr. Ren keeps viewers up to speed on the latest in sex toys, books, magazines and videos, and brings in special guests to keep things interesting. The fun doesn't stop there! Throughout the series, Dr. Ren is always ready to answer viewer email, phone and video questions, making "Let's Talk Sex with Dr. Pega Ren" your one-stop guide to all your GLBT sex and relationship queries.
imdb.title: Let's Talk Sex
plot: Renowned sexpert, Dr. Pega Ren, has teamed up with Jonny Staub and OUTtv to bring you a sex and relationship advice show for the GLBT community.::Anonymous

Renowned sexpert and columnist, Dr. Pega Ren, has teamed up with OUTtv to bring you a sex and relationship advice show for the GLBT community. Along with co-host Jonny Staub, Dr. Ren brings you the latest info on Dating & Courtship, Masturbation, Gender Identity, and a variety of other topics. Not one to miss a step, Dr. Ren keeps viewers up to speed on the latest in sex toys, books, magazines and videos, and brings in special guests to keep things interesting. The fun doesn't stop there! Throughout the series, Dr. Ren is always ready to answer viewer email, phone and video questions, making "_Let's Talk Sex_ (qv) with Dr. Pega Ren" your one-stop guide to all your GLBT sex and relationship queries.::Anonymous
